name: Silex
author: Alex Hoyau aka lexoyo

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:prodotype && npm run build:js:release
scripts.build:prodotype: mkdir -p dist/client/libs/prodotype/components && cp node_modules/prodotype/pub/prodotype.js node_modules/prodotype/pub/prodotype-logo-small.png dist/client/libs/prodotype/ && prodotype src/components dist/client/libs/prodotype/components/
scripts.build:js:release: java -jar node_modules/superstartup-closure-compiler/build/es6compiler.jar --js submodules/closure-library/closure/goog/ --js src/js/ --externs src/externs.js --js_output_file dist/client/js/admin.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --warning_level=VERBOSE --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --create_source_map dist/client/js/admin.js.map --closure_entry_point silex.App --only_closure_dependencies --manage_closure_dependencies --define="goog.DEBUG=false"
scripts.build:js:debug: java -jar node_modules/superstartup-closure-compiler/build/es6compiler.jar --debug --js submodules/closure-library/closure/goog/ --js src/js/ --externs src/externs.js --js_output_file dist/client/js/admin.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --warning_level=VERBOSE --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --create_source_map dist/client/js/admin.js.map --closure_entry_point silex.App --only_closure_dependencies --manage_closure_dependencies --define="goog.DEBUG=true" && echo "//# sourceMappingURL=/js/admin.js.map" >> dist/client/js/admin.js
scripts.init:templates: mkdir -p dist/client/libs/templates && cp -r node_modules/silex-templates node_modules/silex-blank-templates dist/client/libs/templates/
scripts.watch:client: watch 'npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:prodotype && npm run build:js:debug && npm run lint:js' src/
scripts.postinstall: npm run init:prodotype && npm run init:templates && npm run build

keywords: free website builder with source code
